name: Settler
uniques: Founds a new city <by consuming this unit>
Excess Food converted to Production when under construction
All tiles cost 1 movement <if [Palace] is not constructed>

name: Crusader Castle Builder
uniques: Can instantly construct a [Crusader Castle] improvement <by consuming this unit>
Is part of Great Person group [General]
Can be purchased for [750] [Gold] [in all cities] <before discovering [Renaissance era]> <hidden from users>
Can be purchased for [1500] [Gold] [in all cities] <starting from the [Renaissance era]> <before discovering [Modern era]> <hidden from users>
Can be purchased for [2250] [Gold] [in all cities] <starting from the [Modern era]> <hidden from users>

name: Templar Knight
uniques: Never appears as a Barbarian unit
